ht32f5xxxx_sled.c File Reference

This file provides all the SLED firmware functions. More...

#include "ht32f5xxxx_sled.h"

Go to the source code of this file.

Functions

void SLED_DeInit (HT_SLED_TypeDef *SLEDx)
 Deinitialize the specified SLED peripheral registers to their default reset values.
void SLED_Init (HT_SLED_TypeDef *SLEDx, SLED_InitTypeDef *SLED_InitStruct)
 Initialize the specified SLED peripheral according to the specified parameters in the SLED_InitStruct.
void SLED_Cmd (HT_SLED_TypeDef *SLEDx, ControlStatus NewState)
 Enable or Disable the specified SLED peripheral.
void SLED_OutputCmd (HT_SLED_TypeDef *SLEDx, ControlStatus NewState)
 Enable or Disable the specified SLED output.
void SLED_PDMACmd (HT_SLED_TypeDef *SLEDx, ControlStatus NewState)
 Enable or Disable the specified SLED PDMA request.
void SLED_IntCmd (HT_SLED_TypeDef *SLEDx, ControlStatus NewState)
 Enable or Disable the specified SLED interrupt.
void SLED_ClearIntFlag (HT_SLED_TypeDef *SLEDx)
 Clear the specified SLED interrupt flag.
void SLED_InsertResetCode (HT_SLED_TypeDef *SLEDx)
 Insert a Reset Code on the specified SLED.
FlagStatus SLED_GetResetCodeStatus (HT_SLED_TypeDef *SLEDx)
 Return the FIFO status of the specified SLED.
FlagStatus SLED_GetBusyStatus (HT_SLED_TypeDef *SLEDx)
 Return the BUSY status of the specified SLED.
void SLED_FIFOTrigLevelConfig (HT_SLED_TypeDef *SLEDx, u8 FifoLevel)
 Set the specified SLED FIFO trigger level.
u8 SLED_GetFIFOStatus (HT_SLED_TypeDef *SLEDx)
 Return the FIFO status of the specified SLED.
void SLED_FIFOReset (HT_SLED_TypeDef *SLEDx)
 Reset the specified SLED FIFO.

Detailed Description

This file provides all the SLED firmware functions.
